message: All metadata fields for the indicator 16-5-6, translated into en
data: Goal 16. Promote the emergence of peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, ensure access to justice for all and build, at all levels, effective, accountable and inclusive institutions16.5. Significantly reduce corruption and the practice of bribes in all their forms16.5.6. Transparency in the recruitment and management of State personnelNot definedNot defined
